q: Barack Obama !( CNN)-- Former Secretary of State Colin Powell announced Sunday that he will be voting for Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's`` ability to inspire'' and the`` inclusive nature of his campaign.'' I think he is a transformational figure, he is a new generation coming onto the world stage, onto the Brenda Battle stage, and for that reason I'll be voting for Barack Obama , Colin Powell said on NBC's`` Meet the Press.'' Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.
